## Getting started: How to program Smarthon SmartCity IoT Starter Kit on micro:bit

<span id="subtitle">Step 1</span><BR><P>
Go to [MakeCode](https://makecode.microbit.org), create a new progject<BR><P>
![auto_fit](images/iot_image15.png)<P>
<span id="subtitle">Step 2</span><BR><P>
Give the project a name<BR><P>
![auto_fit](images/iot_image16.png)<P>
<span id="subtitle">Step 3</span><BR><P>
Click the more and choose extensions in the pull down menu<BR><P>
![auto_fit](images/iot_image17.png)<P>
<span id="subtitle">Step 4</span><BR><P>
Input the URL of the extension for IoT:bit, then click on it to import the extension<BR><P>
![auto_fit](images/iot_image18.png)<P>
<span id="subtitle">Step 5</span><BR><P>
Extension “SmartCity” & “WiFi IoT:bit” package has been added successfully.<BR><P>
![auto_fit](images/iot_image19.png)<P>
You can start to use the IoT:bit in MakeCode now!<P>
